Text:
Do you people agree that it's quite obnoxious to split files into numerous parts for torrents?

it's actually discouraging for seeding, since I'll have to keep two copies, one split for seeding and another combined for my use.

I've never had a problem with files split for torrenting. Double the size while re-sharing is fine by me when I am getting something for free AND good quality. 

Thanks for the up sceneline!!
